Title: Nimish Khandelwal | Personal Website
Name: Nimish Khandelwal
Description: Pursuing B.Tech from Shri Govindram Seksaria Institute of Technology and Science,Indore. Passionate about competitive coding and a keen musician.
I grab every opportunity I get to sing , learn ,create and travel.
AboutContent: I’m an Electronics and Telecommunication major by day, a Musician by evening, a coder by midnight and a hustler always.
If you cannnot find me, it’s because I’m already cycling, off to a hike, or studying for an exam
Either it is a code or a note, I always try to hit it accurately
I love the way hardwork takes a person from being a novice to an expert, thus strive to work hard every day
WorkContent: I am currently pursuing B.Tech from Shri Govindram Seksaria Institute of Technology and Science,Indore
ProjectsStartLine: Some of the side projects I have done are :

Projects.name: Created a ready to use login system including various APIs from Google,Facebook,Twitter for an easy authentication of the user

CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
